Package maldiniPaone.databaseConnection

Class DataCollector

java.lang.Object
maldiniPaone.databaseConnection.DataCollector
public class DataCollector
extends java.lang.Object
This class contains protected static methods which are used to retrieve data about reports and assignments. Those methods checks parameters values to check data validity and avoid inconsistent data. All methods may throw exceptions if database can't be reached or parameters are not valid. The actual communication with the database happens in ReportAndAssignmentDatabaseConnector.
See Also:
ReportAndAssignmentDatabaseConnector

  • Method Details

    • getReportCountInLastWeek

      protected static java.lang.Integer getReportCountInLastWeek​(Location location) throws ServerSideDatabaseException, IllegalParameterException
      Gets the number of reports done close to a given location.Calls the appropriate method in ReportAndAssignmentDatabaseConnector and checks the validity of the parameters
      Parameters:
      location - : the location to which respect the reports are searched
      Returns:
      Integer : the number of reports (0 if no match)
      Throws:
      ServerSideDatabaseException - when the database can't be found
      IllegalParameterException - when parameters are not valid(empty or null)

    • getReportsMadeBy

      protected static java.util.List<Report> getReportsMadeBy​(java.lang.String Username) throws ServerSideDatabaseException, IllegalParameterException
      Gets the List of reports done by a user.Calls the appropriate method in ReportAndAssignmentDatabaseConnector and checks the validity of the parameters
      Parameters:
      Username - : the username whose reports are being searched
      Returns:
      List of Reports : the List of reports of the user empty List if none is found
      Throws:
      ServerSideDatabaseException - when the database can't be found
      IllegalParameterException - when parameters are not valid(empty or null)

    • getAssignmentsCountInLastWeek

      protected static java.lang.Integer getAssignmentsCountInLastWeek​(Location location) throws ServerSideDatabaseException, IllegalParameterException
      Gets the number of Assignments done close to a given location.Calls the appropriate method in ReportAndAssignmentDatabaseConnector and checks the validity of the parameters
      Parameters:
      location - : the location to which respect the assignments are searched
      Returns:
      Integer : the number of assignments (0 if no match)
      Throws:
      ServerSideDatabaseException - when the database can't be found
      IllegalParameterException - when parameters are not valid(empty or null)

    • getAssignment

      protected static java.util.List<Assignment> getAssignment​(Location location) throws ServerSideDatabaseException, IllegalParameterException
      Gets the List of pending Assignments in a given location.Calls the appropriate method in ReportAndAssignmentDatabaseConnector and checks the validity of the parameters
      Parameters:
      location - : the location to which respect the assignments are being searched
      Returns:
      List of AssignmentServlet : the List of assignment in the location empty List if none is found
      Throws:
      ServerSideDatabaseException - when the database can't be found
      IllegalParameterException - when parameters are not valid(empty or null)

    • checkActive

      protected static java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> checkActive​(java.lang.String username) throws ServerSideDatabaseException, IllegalParameterException
      Check if there are active assignment for the authority
      Parameters:
      username - : the user name of the user who made the reports
      Returns:
      true if there is an active assignment false otherwise
      Throws:
      ServerSideDatabaseException - the connection to the database could not be instantiated
      IllegalParameterException - if not valid coordinates are saved

    • getSuggestion

      protected static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getSuggestion​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String province) throws ServerSideDatabaseException, IllegalParameterException
      Gets the List of static suggestions made by user to a cityhall
      Parameters:
      name - : the name of the cityhall
      province - : the name of the province where the cityhall is located
      Returns:
      List of AssignmentServlet : the List of static suggestions for the cityhall empty List if none is found
      Throws:
      ServerSideDatabaseException - when the database can't be found
      IllegalParameterException - when parameters are not valid(empty or null)

    • getViolations

      protected static java.util.List<Violation> getViolations​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String province) throws IllegalParameterException, ServerSideDatabaseException
      gets the list of the violation associated to a given city hall
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the city hall
      province - the province in which the city hall is located
      Returns:
      List of violations associated to the cityhall
      Throws:
      IllegalParameterException - when violation type is not supported
      ServerSideDatabaseException - when database can't be found

    • getClosestCityHall

      protected static CityHall getClosestCityHall​(Location location) throws ServerSideDatabaseException, IllegalParameterException
      Gets the closest cityhall if one exists
      Parameters:
      location - the location which respect the cityhall is searched
      Returns:
      the cityhall if exists any otherwise null
      Throws:
      ServerSideDatabaseException - when the database can't be found
      IllegalParameterException - when parameters are not valid(empty or null)
